title: An Aristocratic Boy Who Was Recognized as an “Apostate” and Was Banished From His Parents’ Home, Noticed How To Use the Skill “Sacred King” in a Remote Area, and Grew Up - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdom Building   Knights   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Politics   Saints
author: Oka / Okano Yuu   丘/丘野　優
description: One day, Noah, the successor to a certain duke's family, was recognized as an 'apostate' by the church and was expelled from his parents' house. The reason was that the blessing skill given to everyone in this world was very rare and at the same time had a name that made the authority of the church questionable. However, Noah was not immediately captured due to his family's wit, and was sent to a remote area as it was. There, Noah's story of how he understands how to use his power and gradually grows stronger and bigger.>
